settings.name: Local time
settings.description: Select if you want to add to local timezones (with savings time) converted timestamps to your dataset.

settings.name: Local time details
settings.description: Select if you want to add the following details of the local timestamps to your dataset: date, time, year, month, Julian day, calender week, weekday.

settings.name: Mean solar time
settings.description: Select if you want to add to mean solar time converted timestamps to your dataset.

settings.name: True solar time
settings.description: Select if you want to add to true solar time converted timestamps to your dataset.
